title: [CLIENT] TALIYAH SPLASH -ART MISSING ON LAUNCHER'S FREE CHAPION ROTATION
body:
When opening league in the laucher where you get to launch the game to the log in screen. the splash-art for {{champion:163}}  is missing it is just shows as a black window. even if i click the image is apears as a broken image while her name, titel, roles and stats are shown correctly 

nothing special needs to be done.
just open league and you will see.

i tried restarting 3 times still the same effect.

replies.body:
This tends to happen with a lot of newly released champs

the same happened with tahm
Thanks for the report - we're looking into it! :D
